name: tpsprop2d
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, ctps)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(ctopn, c1)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(c0 ∈ TopSp ↔ c1 ∈ TopSp))
⊣ (w0 →(Base ` c0)=(Base ` c1))
⊣ (w0 →(TopOpen ` c0)=(TopOpen ` c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, ctps)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(ctopn, c1)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(c0 ∈ TopSp ↔ c1 ∈ TopSp))
⊣ (w0 →(Base ` c0)=(Base ` c1))
⊣ (w0 →(TopOpen ` c0)=(TopOpen ` c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(ctopn, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cts, c0), cfv(cts, c1)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(TopOpen ` c0)=(TopOpen ` c1))
⊣ (w0 →(Base ` c0)=(Base ` c1))
⊣ (w0 →(TopSet ` c0)=(TopSet ` c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, ctps)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cts, c0), cfv(cts, c1)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(c0 ∈ TopSp ↔ c1 ∈ TopSp))
⊣ (w0 →(Base ` c0)=(Base ` c1))
⊣ (w0 →(TopSet ` c0)=(TopSet ` c1))

comment: A topological space depends only on the base and topology components. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2015.)
